mapper.select:
select mob.item_code || mob.sub_item_code || mob.option_code || mob.option_branch_code as keyCode, mob.sub_item_code as mobSubItemCode, mob.option_code as mobOptionCode, mob.option_branch_code as mobOptionBranchCode, moap.sub_item_code as moapSubItemCode, moap.option_code as moapOptionCode, moap.option_branch_code as moapOptionBranchCode, COALESCE(moap.price, 0) as moapPrice, COALESCE(moap.double_price, 0) as moapDoublePrice, mow.sub_item_code as mowSubItemCode, mow.option_code as mowOptionCode, mow.option_branch_code as mowOptionBranchCode, COALESCE(mow.wage, 0) as mowWage from mtb_option_branch as mob left join mtb_option_wage as mow on mob.sub_item_code = mow.sub_item_code and mob.option_code = mow.option_code and mob.option_branch_code = mow.option_branch_code and mob.item_code = mow.item_code and mow.factory_code = #{arg4} left join mtb_option_accessory_price as moap on mob.sub_item_code = moap.sub_item_code and mob.option_code = moap.option_code and mob.option_branch_code = moap.option_branch_code and mob.item_code = moap.item_code and moap.factory_code = #{arg4} where mob.order_pattern = 'PO' and mob.item_code = #{arg5}
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg2},#{arg3})
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg2})
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg3})
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1})
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg0})
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg1})
and mob.sub_item_code in (#{arg2})

select.if:
select mdbw.item_code || mdbw.sub_item_code keyItemCode, COALESCE(mfa.fabric_price, 0) as fabricPrice, mfa.factory_code as mfaFactoryCode, COALESCE(mbw.wage, 0) as mbwWage, COALESCE(mdbw.wage, 0) as mdbwWage, COALESCE(mnap.price, 0) as mnapPrice, COALESCE(mdbap.price, 0) as mdbapPrice, mdbw.item_code as mbwItemCode, mdbw.sub_item_code as mdbwSubItemCode from mtb_fabric as mfa, mtb_base_wage as mbw left join mtb_double_breasted_wage as mdbw on mdbw.factory_code = mbw.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mdbw.item_code, mtb_nomal_accessory_price as mnap left join mtb_double_breasted_accessory_price as mdbap on mdbap.factory_code = mnap.factory_code and mnap.item_code = mdbap.item_code and mnap.order_pattern = mdbap.order_pattern where mnap.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mnap.item_code and mdbw.sub_item_code = mdbap.sub_item_code and mfa.fabric_no = #{arg5} and mbw.item_code = #{arg4} and mnap.order_pattern = 'PO'
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg2},#{arg3})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg2})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg3})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg0})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg1})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg2})

select mbw.item_code || mbw.item_code keyItemCode, COALESCE(mfa.fabric_price, 0) as fabricPrice, mfa.factory_code as mfaFactoryCode, COALESCE(mbw.wage, 0) as mbwWage, COALESCE(mdbw.wage, 0) as mdbwWage, COALESCE(mnap.price, 0) as mnapPrice, COALESCE(mdbap.price, 0) as mdbapPrice, mdbw.item_code as mbwItemCode, mdbw.sub_item_code as mdbwSubItemCode from mtb_fabric as mfa, mtb_base_wage as mbw left join mtb_double_breasted_wage as mdbw on mdbw.factory_code = mbw.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mdbw.item_code, mtb_nomal_accessory_price as mnap left join mtb_double_breasted_accessory_price as mdbap on mdbap.factory_code = mnap.factory_code and mnap.item_code = mdbap.item_code and mnap.order_pattern = mdbap.order_pattern where mnap.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mnap.item_code and mfa.fabric_no = #{arg5} and mbw.item_code = #{arg4} and mnap.order_pattern = 'PO'

mapper.select:
select mobd.item_code || mobd.sub_item_code || mobd.option_code || mobd.option_branch_code || moadp.option_branch_detail_code as keyDetailCode, mobd.sub_item_code as mobdSubItemCode, mobd.option_code as mobdOptionCode, mobd.option_branch_code as mobdOptionBranchCode, moap.option_code as moapOptionCodeT, moap.option_branch_code as moapOptionBranchCodeT, COALESCE(moap.price, 0) as moapPriceT, COALESCE(moap.double_price, 0) as moapDoublePriceT, mow.option_code as mowOptionCodeT, mow.option_branch_code as mowOptionBranchCodeT, COALESCE(mow.wage, 0) as mowWageT, moadp.option_branch_detail_code as moadpOptionBranchDetailCode, COALESCE(moadp.price, 0) as moadpPrice, COALESCE(moadp.double_price, 0) as moadpDoublePrice from mtb_option_branch_detail as mobd left join mtb_option_wage as mow on mobd.sub_item_code = mow.sub_item_code and mobd.option_code = mow.option_code and mobd.option_branch_code = mow.option_branch_code and mobd.item_code = mow.item_code and mow.factory_code = #{arg4} left join mtb_option_accessory_price as moap on mobd.sub_item_code = moap.sub_item_code and mobd.option_code = moap.option_code and mobd.option_branch_code = moap.option_branch_code and mobd.item_code = moap.item_code and moap.factory_code = #{arg4} left join mtb_option_accessory_detail_price as moadp on mobd.sub_item_code = moadp.sub_item_code and mobd.option_code = moadp.option_code and mobd.option_branch_code = moadp.option_branch_code and mobd.option_branch_detail_code = moadp.option_branch_detail_code and mobd.item_code = moadp.item_code and moadp.factory_code = #{arg4} where mobd.order_pattern = 'PO' and mobd.item_code = #{arg5}

and mobd.sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg3})

and mobd.sub_item_code in (#{arg0})
and mobd.sub_item_code in (#{arg1})
and mobd.sub_item_code in (#{arg2})

select sub_item_code as subItemCode, nomal_fabric_amount as nomalFabricAmount, double_breasted_fabric_amount as doubleBreastedFabricAmount from mtb_yield where sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg2},#{arg3})

select mwp.factory_code || mwp.item_code as wholesaleKeyCode, dollar_exchange as dollarExchange, product_tariff as productTariff, product_shipping as productShipping, shipping_error as shippingError from mtb_wholesale_piece as mwp, mtb_fabric as mfa where mwp.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mfa.fabric_no = #{arg0} and mfa.order_pattern = 'PO'

select mfa.factory_code as mfaFactoryCode, COALESCE(mfa.fabric_price, 0) as fabricPrice, COALESCE(mfa.ws_price_adjust, 0) as wsPriceAdjust from mtb_fabric as mfa where mfa.fabric_no = #{arg0} and mfa.order_pattern = 'PO'

select sub_item_code as subItemCode, nomal_fabric_amount as nomalFabricAmount, double_breasted_fabric_amount as doubleBreastedFabricAmount from mtb_yield where sub_item_code in (#{arg0},#{arg1},#{arg2},#{arg3},#{arg4},#{arg5})

select mwp.factory_code || mwp.item_code as wholesaleKeyCode, dollar_exchange as dollarExchange, product_tariff as productTariff, product_shipping as productShipping, shipping_error as shippingError from mtb_wholesale_piece as mwp, mtb_fabric as mfa where mwp.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mfa.fabric_no = #{arg0} and mfa.order_pattern = 'CO'

select.if:
select mdbw.item_code || mdbw.sub_item_code keyItemCode, COALESCE(mfa.fabric_price, 0) as fabricPrice, mfa.factory_code as mfaFactoryCode, COALESCE(mbw.wage, 0) as mbwWage, COALESCE(mdbw.wage, 0) as mdbwWage, COALESCE(mnap.price, 0) as mnapPrice, COALESCE(mdbap.price, 0) as mdbapPrice, mdbw.item_code as mbwItemCode, mdbw.sub_item_code as mdbwSubItemCode from mtb_fabric as mfa, mtb_base_wage as mbw left join mtb_double_breasted_wage as mdbw on mdbw.factory_code = mbw.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mdbw.item_code, mtb_nomal_accessory_price as mnap left join mtb_double_breasted_accessory_price as mdbap on mdbap.factory_code = mnap.factory_code and mnap.item_code = mdbap.item_code and mnap.order_pattern = mdbap.order_pattern where mnap.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mnap.item_code and mdbw.sub_item_code = mdbap.sub_item_code and mfa.fabric_no = #{arg7} and mbw.item_code = #{arg6} and mnap.order_pattern = 'CO'

and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg0})
and mdbw.sub_item_code in (#{arg1})

if.test: param7 == "03" or param7 == "04" or param7 == "05" or param7 == "06"

select.if: select mbw.item_code || mbw.item_code keyItemCode, COALESCE(mfa.fabric_price, 0) as fabricPrice, mfa.factory_code as mfaFactoryCode, COALESCE(mbw.wage, 0) as mbwWage, COALESCE(mdbw.wage, 0) as mdbwWage, COALESCE(mnap.price, 0) as mnapPrice, COALESCE(mdbap.price, 0) as mdbapPrice, mdbw.item_code as mbwItemCode, mdbw.sub_item_code as mdbwSubItemCode from mtb_fabric as mfa, mtb_base_wage as mbw left join mtb_double_breasted_wage as mdbw on mdbw.factory_code = mbw.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mdbw.item_code, mtb_nomal_accessory_price as mnap left join mtb_double_breasted_accessory_price as mdbap on mdbap.factory_code = mnap.factory_code and mnap.item_code = mdbap.item_code and mnap.order_pattern = mdbap.order_pattern where mnap.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.factory_code = mfa.factory_code and mbw.item_code = mnap.item_code and mfa.fabric_no = #{arg7} and mbw.item_code = #{arg6} and mnap.order_pattern = 'CO'
